Citrus Nutrition

Too much nitrogen means too much vegetative growth, poor quality fruit and ground water contamination. Not enough nutrients means lower fruit yields and fruit quality.

  • Citrus Overview and fertilization (from UFlorida)
    • Approximately 1.75 kg N is removed in each t of fruit harvested.
  • Common Nutrient deficiencies Fact sheet (UC Davis)

Citrus Nutrient Management from ipoucd
